title: JSON schema for elm-package.json configuration files

_88rangeDependency.description: Dependencies are specified by [author name]/[package name]: [exact version or range]. Range versions look like: [1.0.0 <= v < 2.0.0].

___version.description: Your package's version in semantic versioning format.

___exposed-modules.description: All modules that your project will make available to end users.

___source-directories.description: A list of directories that will be used to build your project.

$eref.description: Dependencies are specified by [author name]/[package name]: [exact version or range]. Range versions look like: [1.0.0 <= v < 2.0.0].

___dependencies.description: A list of elm dependencies that your package needs.

___summary.description: A helpful summary of your package, less than 80 characters

___elm-version.description: The version of elm your package is targeting
